data.title: Republic of Ireland Football Fixtures On TV In The UK
data.meta_description: View complete listings of Republic of Ireland on TV including their UEFA Nations League matches on Premier Sports.
data.text:
When is the next Republic of Ireland game on TV?

The next Republic of Ireland game on TV is Republic of Ireland v England on Saturday 7th September 2024 in the UEFA Nations League Group Stage and the match kicks off at 5:00pm.

What channel is the Republic of Ireland game on?

The Republic of Ireland v England game will be shown live on ITV1, STV, ITVX and STV Player.
